wpt.name: GC2E7MH
wpt.desc: The Serfs Speak! Markers Bear Warnin9 by The Lowly Serfs of the Kin9dom, Traditional Cache (1.5/1.5)
wpt.urlname: The Serfs Speak! Markers Bear Warnin9

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: The Serfs Speak! Markers Bear Warnin9
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:placed_by: The Lowly Serfs of the Kin9dom
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:short_description: The serfs begin their proclamation with an admonition. May this tiny hide insure all who enter the Kin9dom do so with the full understanding of the proceedings of both flanks of the local nobility, and the extent of their consequence.
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
Not content to allow the nobility to command the frivolity of Surroundin9 the Kin9dom, the Kin9dom's serfs are taking matters into their own hands. Can the serfs come to the aide of the Kin9 in his moratorium? Or can they only buttress the Lovely Ladies of Lionville in their foolhardy siege? The saga continues...
BYOP
Congrats to LNUGE for FTF... twelve hours ahead of the rest. Who checks their e-mail in the evening?

groundspeak:log.groundspeak:text: Took us a couple minutes, but we got it. I think we over-thought the title. Or maybe we under-thought it. Well, we got it before too long. Found with dawnie22, 19acassel, and our younger daughter.
